text: Lots of critical issues on Capitol Hill. I’m hosting another Live Tele-Talk Story next Monday, June 13th, 6:30PM Hawai’i time to update you on Congress’ and my actions, listen to your concerns and answer your questions. Please join. Details in my graphics https://t.co/qU8iuObGe8
…great but often unknown and under-appreciated contributions to securing our borders, running our customs and keeping us safe. (2/2) https://t.co/CnVHcLH5ef

Big mahalo to the 400 agents/specialists of our U.S. Customs & Border Patrol area Port of Honolulu covering HI/Pacific; they gave me a full brief on their many activities like inspecting incoming containers/packages and streamlining international arrivals;… (1/2) https://t.co/rJJrgWBAmU

Great news that the Secretary of the Navy has agreed to my and my colleagues’ request to name a new Navy surface combat ship after Telesforo Trinidad, a Filipino American who was awarded the Congressional Medal of Honolulu for saving his shipmates in 1915. https://t.co/0hl6fJLuZk
